item.title: Kid Cudi Details Struggles With Depression, Addiction and Near-Fatal Overdose in New Memoir ‘Cudi’
item.description: Kid Cudi is opening up like never before in his debut memoir “Cudi,” out Aug. 12. In the 320-page autobiography, the multi-hyphenate artist, born Scott Mescudi, traces his early childhood
